page.title: 07Survey,H/hold Goods,Yeovil.
page.content: 130 children (aged 8-11) in our school were asked if their families possessed certain items.{Table 1}shows those who said 'Yes'.The same children also told us about cars & TV sets their families owned,(parents would be mainly middle class, aged 30/40). {TABLE 2 0 Car Families 9 {TABLE 1} 1 Car Families 76 Central Heating 112 2 Car Families 34 Telephone 120 3 Car Families 8 Shower 92 4 Car Families 2 Dishwasher 18 7 Car Families 1 Fridge 113 {TABLE 3 Micro Wave 48 0 TV Families 00 Food mixer 86 1 TV Families 30 Computer 68 2 TV Families 56 Video Recorder 70 3 TV Families 36 Double Glazing 62 4 TV Families 5 Electric Organ 32 5 TV Families 2 Piano 21 6 TV Families 1
